name: start, then nothing
description:
The game

Since I just had a few hours to participate to the Ludum Dare #45, I made this little game with a very simple gameplay - so I can't tell myself that I didn't do anything.

Despite, I hope you'll enjoy it. I really like the idea, so maybe I will update it later.

Credits
  • Game by Tim MARTIN-VIGIER.
  • Font: Tuffy Bold by Thatcher ULRICH, in public domain.
  • Musics:
    • Magnetic Field Cerulean
      Matt BOWDLER, aka The Unfinished (99sounds.org)
